items.title: I am
items.comment: Used to introduce oneself or state identity.

items.title: Very good
items.comment: Used to express that something is very good or well done.

items.title: Not good
items.comment: Used to indicate something is bad or not good.

items.title: Okay / Can
items.comment: Used to express permission or that something is acceptable.

items.title: So-so
items.comment: Literally means 'horse horse tiger tiger,' used to describe something as just average or so-so.

items.title: How about you?
items.comment: Used to return a question to someone, often in casual conversation.

items.title: Thank you very much
items.comment: A formal and polite way to express deep gratitude.
